Room.Name: Dead Poet's Tombstone
Room.ShortDescription: You stand before a battered granite tombstone, which stands in recognition of a long forgotten poet. An elegaic peom begins, "The meaning of life..." but is has been made unreadable by the sands of time, haveing eroded the raised letters.
Room.LongDescription: As you approach the tombstone, you hear a voice speaking, perhaps to itself.
